name: Sonic The Hedgehog (GG/SMS)
description: This is the first game in the Sonic series developed for Game Gear. While the battle between Dr. Eggman and Sonic over the Chaos Emeralds remains the same, you can enjoy a completely different game from the Mega Drive version. In addition to the familiar theme music of Masato Nakamura, the music is by Yuzo Koshiro from the "Seventh Dragon" series and "Bare Knuckle" series.
